thread.section_title: The Inn At The Roman Forum - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Hotel I've Ever Stayed In
thread.title_full: Best Hotel I've Ever Stayed In - Review of The Inn At The Roman Forum, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Austin J
title: Best Hotel I've Ever Stayed In
text: My wife and I got married and started our honeymoon in Rome. We had one of the rooms on the top floor with the private garden. The service, food, views and location were amazing. The front desk will give you directions on a map and call taxis if you want one. My wife and I will stay here everytime we go to Rome. They treat you like family and made our honeymoon better than we could have imagined. Book it, it's worth every penny!
